00036 #ifndef PACC_XML_Iterator_hpp_
00037 #define PACC_XML_Iterator_hpp_
00038 
00039 #include "PACC/XML/Node.hpp"
00040 #include "PACC/Util/Assert.hpp"
00041 
00042 namespace PACC { 
00043     
00044     using namespace std;
00045     
00046     namespace XML {
00047         
00065         class Iterator {
00066          public:
00068             Iterator(void) : mNode(0) {}
00070             Iterator(Node* inNode) : mNode(inNode) {}
00071             
00073             Iterator& operator++(void) {
00074                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot increment an invalid iterator!");
00075                 mNode = mNode->mNextSibling; 
00076                 return *this;
00077             }
00079             Iterator operator++(int) {
00080                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot increment an invalid iterator!");
00081                 Iterator lTmp = *this; 
00082                 mNode = mNode->mNextSibling; 
00083                 return lTmp;
00084             }
00086             Iterator& operator--(void) {
00087                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot decrement an invalid iterator!");
00088                 if(mNode) mNode = mNode->mPrevSibling; 
00089                 return *this;
00090             }
00092             Iterator operator--(int) {
00093                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot increment an invalid iterator!");
00094                 Iterator lTmp = *this; 
00095                 mNode = mNode->mPrevSibling; 
00096                 return lTmp;
00097             }
00099             Node& operator*(void) const {
00100                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot dereference an invalid iterator!");
00101                 return *mNode;
00102             }
00104             Node* operator->(void) const {
00105                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Invalid iterator!");
00106                 return mNode;
00107             }
00109             bool operator==(const Iterator& inIter) const {return mNode == inIter.mNode;}
00111             bool operator!=(const Iterator& inIter) const {return mNode != inIter.mNode;}
00113             operator bool(void) const {return mNode != 0;}
00114             
00115          protected:
00116             Node* mNode; 
00117             
00118             friend class ConstIterator;
00119             
00120         };
00121         
00139         class ConstIterator {
00140          public:
00142             ConstIterator(void) : mNode(0) {}
00144             ConstIterator(const Node* inNode) : mNode(inNode) {}
00146             ConstIterator(const Iterator& inPos) : mNode(inPos.mNode) {}
00147             
00149             ConstIterator& operator++(void) {
00150                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot increment an invalid iterator!");
00151                 mNode = mNode->mNextSibling; 
00152                 return *this;
00153             }
00155             ConstIterator operator++(int) {
00156                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot increment an invalid iterator!");
00157                 ConstIterator lTmp = *this; 
00158                 mNode = mNode->mNextSibling; 
00159                 return lTmp;
00160             }
00162             ConstIterator& operator--(void) {
00163                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot decrement an invalid iterator!");
00164                 mNode = mNode->mPrevSibling; 
00165                 return *this;
00166             }
00168             ConstIterator operator--(int) {
00169                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot decrement an invalid iterator!");
00170                 ConstIterator lTmp = *this; 
00171                 mNode = mNode->mPrevSibling; 
00172                 return lTmp;
00173             }
00175             const Node& operator*(void) const {
00176                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Cannot dereference an invalid iterator!");
00177                 return *mNode;
00178             }
00180             const Node* operator->(void) const {
00181                 PACC_AssertM(mNode, "Invalid iterator!");
00182                 return mNode;
00183             }
00185             bool operator==(const ConstIterator& inIter) const {return mNode == inIter.mNode;}
00187             bool operator!=(const ConstIterator& inIter) const {return mNode != inIter.mNode;}
00189             operator bool(void) const {return mNode != 0;}
00190             
00191          protected:
00192             const Node* mNode; 
00193             
00194         };
